content: We adore the app. NORTH* continues to perform well for us, after 7 years!
👍🏼100% satisfied

I seem to be experiencing the same glitches as others: it takes quite a while to turn on the live feed. I've never been able to use the microphone in real time over the past 2 years Ive had the service. The geofence does not work and it takes too long to arm or disarm from the app. I have had problems with the main panel not taking the code in the house and I"m not satisfied with the tech support received over the phone. I plan on going back to ADT at the end of this contract.
The app randomly stops working. The customer service is near non existing. Run fast and far away from this company
Very nice and simple

Front door cam barely worked but now with the recent update when someone rings front door the app will not open to show who is there, which completely defeats the purpose. Also if the doorbell is pressed it takes a long time for video to show and often the video won't even open
I am very disappointed with this system. To get doorbell camera it takes too long to work and the speaker works half of the time. Not happy at all !!
Takes too long to load and disarm alarm. Absolute unacceptable.
Poor service very slow download poor,
Horrible can't wait to get out of this contract!! Worst system I have ever had!! They are lucky they got 1 star

Its OKAY, but for a security app I need to be able to arm the system QUICKLY, but even that feature is behind a password or fingerprint which takes a while to do. Half the time the fingerprint isn't accepted (by the app not the phone). It takes WAY too long to view my doorbell cameras and the sensitivity of it is way too high where I had to turn off notifications of motion which defeats its purpose .
0k

Awesome app and VERY helpful with the things I needed help on like geofencing or trying the app on my phone. The updated version is awful and more efficient to the app itself. It shows the weather, sensors that's connected to your home. And do it ALL on your phone! LOVE IT!
To slow ,need work

App worked fine until June update. Now every page in the app is blank. It shows nothing when you click on Users, My Profile, etc. Just blank pages. Can't make any edits or anything. I've cleared the cache and still nothing. Please fix this.

The volume doesn't always work and the sound isn't clear. The app works slow especially when you try to open it when someone rings the doorbell. Now the app doesn't allow me to review the videos. Says it only stores 7 days worth. They has to be the worst app ever.
I get good secive and notice
EXCELLENT JOB
Great service!
Great home security!!
Doesn't connect right away big delay and cameras doesn't work. I regret getting another contract with this company 👎👎
Don't get this! They lock you in for 5 Years even when the salesman tells you that you can cancel after the first two months. SCAM ARTISTS!
Sucks
App does the job it was created to do very well.
Won't connect to doorbell camera anymore. It doesnt record events at all.
Badly
App won't connect to doorbell camera anymore. Maybe since last update?
Grea
I had a good experience for many years
It is a bit confusing when we come home & the lights are flashing blue then green ...WHY ?
Rarley connect to camera anymore theres like a 3 second delay to please fix this the connection in the cameras are not good
Not having internet as of now.
Very dissatisfied with their customer service
Does nothing but time out, and no view of our doorbell.

Their equipment is not durable and they'll charge you a $99 technician fee every time they come out to fix it. There is also problems with the app reading the cameras. I had to reinstall the cameras so the app can communicate with them. Not recommending them to anyone I know. Will not be roped into a contract again with them.

I have to uninstall the app at least 3 times a month. I'm not very happy with it. That was an old review. I now have to uninstall it about 2 times a week. So annoying! And the company itself, wouldn't recommend to anyone. And still I have like 3 yrs on the contact!

If I could give no stars I would. The app is terrible! My doorbell never works and I can't pull up my indoor cameras from the app at all. I am extremely disappointed that I have to stay with this company and their crappy service
When door bell rings or someone approach I get the alert twenty three minutes later. I might as well not have it!!!
I like the way you are come straightor finding a description in the in the sound of the house or entrance to the house thank you
We love our system

Home security system is decent. This accompanying app to run everything is extemely limited. It does not intergrade with Google Home or much anything else. The included Skybell doorbell is third party hardware that requires an additional app to run. Neither Northstar nor Skybell integrate with Google Home. It's frustrating since you have to toggle back and forth between 3+ apps if you run additional hardware like thermostats or wifi light switches.

Notification delay can be up to 15 minutes. App display of current temp setting can be 1-2 degrees different than thermostat display, neither of which are at the scheduled temp settings. It's very frustrating and constant adjustments are needed. Also, my doorbell camera notifications sound alike even when my phone is on silent.
Is safety ,
The service of very good

I try to turn alarm on/off with app and takes forever. Sometimes it doesn't work. The Geofence will tell me I'm away from my house when I'm home. I have the location set. I also have very high speed internet service.
Technician was professional polite, and kind.
Great service. Knowledgable staff. Very efficient.
I love this thingy,.!! No more porch pirates!!
Great application but needs important,slow to sign in.

Doorbell doesnt chime inside the home. Reinstalled, called tech support which are no help and even asked to replace the doorbell which they denied. Tech support stated they have multiple customers with the same problem and they do not have an answer.
Very satisfied with the service.
Unable to view security videos from archived email.

This is a great app. The monitoring service is excellent. I rated it 4 star only because the doorbell camera is not displayed on the alarm panel and can only be displayed on a phone or tablet. by the time you access it. who ever was at the door is gone most of the time.
Took time to explain technology all whistles n bells
Very good.
My experience with Northstar Is excellent..
Ok
We are happy with the service except for the inside camera on the wall unit. You cannot see anything. If you were wanting a picture of an intruder you are out of luck.
Freezes often and my automations never work from the app

Forced to leave a great comment about company the day system was installed...however after 2 months of service, honestly the worst decision we ever made. Servers will not load most of the time and when you are able to view cameras on phone it lags for a longtime before you can see the image. Looking forward to breaking contract!
Good
Servers won't load
Great security company. No issue so far with the equipment unlike ADT. Would recommend to anyone

This is a waste of money. On the first month and second month yes they record videos once its detects motion. But now its acting up and they cant fix it. Unless you pay the technician again! I hope people do some research before they sign contract with northstar! Its aweful
Great!
The 3 people worked good together . They explained everything for me to understand.Thanks

Awful company that uses deceptive marketing. The sales rep promises to pay off the prior contract with the alarm company them the corporate office will refuse your claim. Do not sign a contract with this company.
Lags on connection to home system
I'm loving it, I have my whole house under control 24/7 no matter where I am
MY SAFETY MEANS EVERYTHING TO ME. THANK YOU..
Perfect
Love It ! It meets all of the my expectation. Keep up the good work.
Works exelant
good experience
easy to navigate. underatand. fun to browse.very informitive.
The cameras take so long to load, they miss the action!
good and helpful app
just switched from Vivint after 14 years. Vivint was ok but wow these Northstar people got a good thing - prices and equipment plus great customer service so far.

worse choice I've ever made. Tied in a 2 year contract 3 cameras and sensors. they're always malfunctioning and when I reach out to them they tell me to fix it myself and if they send someone out they will charge $100 just to come out. now none of it is working right but one camera and I ve been calling and messaging and I cant even get them to answer me. dont make the mistake I made and go with someone else that actually has a good service and values their customers.

Terrible service. I've been waiting on a tech to show up for 3 months each time an appointment is scheduled they are a no call no show because they use out side contractors (Alarm Depot- they're terrible with communication) Then NorthStar tells you, you have to wait until the work is completed in order for them to credit your account. I'm so disappointed in this company. I wish I could end my contract with them. Update as of 8/5/19 my house was robbed on 8/2/19 Northstar equipment was not working
Lost some function with my Skype Bell: (doorbell) no snapshot that a problem. call service no help.

This app lost my password that was saved and now won't let me reset. The Capcha fails everytime in a loop after correctly selecting the correct tiles. Where is the update to fix, I am not the only person having this issue?

This app is horrible when it comes to trying bto reset your password. I select forgot username and it never sends you an email or text. If i select forgot password when I select not robot and select whatever pictures when i try to select next it unchecks the robot and just puts you in a loop. So frustrating... this shouldn't be that difficult!
good

WOW, this company is excellent. Jeff sure knows his product. Extremely competent and professional, and doesn't try to sell you items you don't need. Robert, the guy who installed the system, was efficient, competent, and provided excellent service. It was a pleasure purchasing my security system.
Ads were too intrusive. I can live without this app.
the abilities and effectiveness between different phones can vary greatly, but overall it's a good app
good
I just love this system.
Awesome
love it

It's either the doorbell or the app. I am not happy. As others have described, notifications are intermittent, camera freezes alot, doorbell doesn't ring through phone and goes offline alot! I will be switching over to the Ring soon. Although not without issues the reviews are favorable and I have also spoken to neighbors who have the ring and they haven't experienced these issues.
It does not work half the time. You can call customer service and they cannot help. They aren't a good service, but they lock you in for 5 years.
love it...
mr romio was very helpful and great he explains everything good thanks for your help
been very reliable, able to check in anywhere and anytime
The camera that was installed are awesome

When app was 'improved' last year they ruined it, each video is now giant onscreen instead of compact. You can only go back 2-3 days instead of a week so when out of town it's a serious pain. Notifications for dog walkers but when I went 'live' I see a car sitting in my driveway at night and no notification of it. I kept getting 'rescan' on house screen bcs someone is trying to access my inside camera, I paid service call only to have guy turn down volume.. REALLY? $2,500 to get out of contract
exelent
very bad
good

This does not work properly. I used to be able to see recorded video from doorbell activity. Now it only notifies me of the activity but I am unable to go and view it. It is not recording and doesn't notify me in time when someone is at my door. Please fix the video and notifications.
when will we be able to talk.
outstanding application
love it
its not working
always having issue with the Damn app! Northstar great services ! But Need a better App Asap!!

geo fencing only works on occasion, frequently have issues where the app takes forever or fails to connect to the panel. If it wasnt such a pain to switch service again, i would have done so long ago.
Love this app. It gives me plenty of functionality.
I love our North Star alarm system but the app not so much! The app barely works and I BARELY WORKS! I honestly can't understand why they have an app at all!
10 days in all is as described.door bell works well.
Always get low battery warning when battery is already kaput. Pisses me off in the middle of the night.
Your app sucks it won't download. Fix it!!!!
It's user friendly, convenient and offers greater peace of mind.
I appreciate them calling when alarm goes off to make sure my family is ok.
Great
I want to remove this app and it won't let me
SkyBell doesn't work well and cameras don't either.. well not great
Doesnt seem like all the features of the app works.
Great app...I can see my home when I'm away from home!
Loses connection to doorbell often
Good
Love it
We just love it!!!
Great app and great security system.
I love Northstar. Friendly and a very quick response
Very useful

It's amazing system and really good company. I'm in love with everything 
the have. I have full coverage in my service.

After the last update my cameras no longer work. Tech support is a joke, 
they said the installer would call to set up an appointment, he never has! 
You don't fix my stuff, I'm not paying!
Great service the app provide
An app shouldn't require multiple logins.
Absolutely terrible.
I keep it simple with just an alarm pad do this app works fine for me. Sometimes times out in logging in but not often.  Can be a little slow at times but overall great for my needs

I was referral from a friend.  The 2 guys said my current 5 cameras are compatible.  NOT!!!!.   My new 2 cameras don't work at all on cell phone or computers, only on keypad.  Now who gonna stand at keypad to look at their cameras?  The app been dead since getting alarm in September.  I changed my password so many times to be kicked out again again, and again, now still can't get on app, also if I were it will freeze/drop. Saying app stop working. Now the alarm keeps going off when house is secure.  So angry.  I'm still paying old alarm system cameras only luckily I did.  Was broken into right after.  The 2 guys who help run a good game on me to get this alarm, they wouldn't answer my texts or phone calls.  I'm upset with this company.
No option to setup skybell with a hidden ssid.

Not able to load my scenes on the Samsung S8+.  So I created scenes before the update and can't change them so I have to set a reminder in my phone to now turn off the heat because I can't stop my heat from coming on.
It keeps crashing after login, has to remove it. Update sucks don't work. Fix soon.
This new version is not user friendly and when making a selection, you only get spinning. You all need to rethink this new application.
I cannot access the app.  I hope someone is working on a update...fast!

Newest version doesn't load up my scenes. It just spins and spins. Bad QA guys. BTW, why update the interface and LOSE features?    On the old in her face I used to be able to not only see my scenes and control them but edit them and now you have to delete it and start all over again what's up with that.   I want the old version back this new one is garbage!!
The new app sucks. Should be darker background and doesn't have the home layout and where the sensors are like the old version
GOOD
I have a Samsung Galaxy Note8 and it force closed every time after I input my login information.
Had to do an update, and now it crashes every time I login.
Since the update, I can't use it. It keeps crashing when trying to log on. Using Samsung Galaxy Note 8.

I loved the option of controlling my home from my phone. Whether at work, vacation, or just at home to turn down the a/c. I was sold. I payed extra for the door lock,  garage door sensor,  a/c control,  and cameras. Everything worked great during the tour after install.  All these features have not been available for the past few weeks. This is the second time already.  Great idea and i love it when it works, but anything that only works half the time sucks. You wouldn't buy a porshe that only starts on even days ...   Just an update. They released a new update for the app last week that crashes every time it opens.  Now the app is completely unusable and worthless until they fix it.
Very convenient
Tech support was not helpful. They seemed to just want to get rid of me
It doesnt give me the option to change thermostat and it makes it useless for the most part! When will this be uodated???!!???!!
I love northstar
50% of the time this app will not log on. I have an Android phone. Wish that update the app or do something to make it log on better
Worst customer service been waiting for a technician to call back for almost 1 week😡. I keep getting the run around! My skybell never works worst alarm service!

I'm two days into a contract with Northstar and the app has had to been the worst part of the entire thing. I've had to uninstall 5 times and reinstall each time and still get the same crappy service with the app. Fix it or I'm out of here contract or no contract

It worked for a couple days after the install and the guy putting the app on my phone.  Even when he called to see how things were after day two. I woke up on the third day and nada. App can't connect and it just a waste of time. Very dissatisfied.  Don't do it! Don't get locked in that 5 year contract.

1/2 the time this app takes forever just to log on, and another 1/4 of the time I get "website error". So the app is good about 1/4 of the time.  Really disappointed. Please make better.  Is anyone looking into making this app better?? Why am I paying for this security when it doesn't work more than 1/2 the time?!
It always works fine for me , never had a problem with the app
Can no longer access the automation features due to update please fix this
Why did my home automations dissapear from my mobile app
This sounds nice and this guy is here so ya bye
Live feed through doorbell or being able to see recorded videos by doorbell camera isn't viewable with Adroid. Very basic for Android. I'll give it a 5 star once these features are on Android apps.
Have never been able to login to the app
What happened to the AUTOMATED icon inside the app? Now I cannot access thermostat, door lock, or the automation settings.  NOT GOOD AT ALL!!!!!
I feel so safe with my Northstar Alarm!

The idea is great but what you get isn't very great. The app rarely receives updates and really could use a face lift. It's very buggy when it comes to controlling thermostats. Most of the time when you change the temperature via app, it turns it 5+ degrees in the opposite direction of what you requested. Was told by sales we would have features that we don't get and they installed equipment very poorly. Not worth it. Also, don't let those screenshots up there fool you. GPS/geofencing is NOT on Android app.

If you are thinking of getting this alarm company for the accessibility granted by the app, don't. Half the time there is connectivity issues. the mornings are crazy with two kids and trying to get to work so I have used the app to set my alarm to come home and find even though the app says it's armed it hasn't been all day. The images they are showing don't seem remotely like what is offered in mine either. Oh, and the thermostat link is never correct. Now, I'm stuck in a contract with a crap service.
I love it and help us reason we are deaf
I loved it very much

Most of the time I get a "Can't connect web service error." From a security company I expect reliability. Not happy with Northstar. Even their home pad doesn't always work. About ready to drop this company for a less expensive and yet, more reliable company.

I keep getting "Web server error" messages and some others a lot lately. Some days I can be sitting in my own driveway and trying to set the alarm and it takes forever. App needs some serious work and updates

For the most part this app works. There are some weird bugs though. Half of the time it says "no service schedule" or something along those lines but it will still arm the alarm. Other times after arming or disarming it will just continue to say arming or disarming, but still does the job. Exit the app and reopen it, and it's done what you wanted it to. Also you can't back out without using your home screen.
Finally a good app and company for our family! Michael Menzel helped us get the system. Would definitely recommend.
Love it
Love it
Great app easy to use and understand
Won't download been trying for a week! I give up!
Works for arm disarm and events great but can't see sensors status??
Is not working properly.. having problems with app.. it's so slow and just freezes.. fix please
If I could give your app less than 1 star I would! I just emailed you and it was rejected by your server! You people are trash!
Worse service ever! And the customer service is horrible!!!
Very bad app

This company and its service and products are horrible. App doesn't work, website doesn't work, thermostat doesn't work, sensors on doors fall off, they double charge for services and then never return the money. Stay away from this company and its products. And please do not expect service after the fact. All this and we are only 14 days in to the service. All I want is my service cancelled and was told I signed a contract, and there was nothing they can do...lol. My attorney has assured me differently.
Was able to get everything to work with the app, but why does the thermostat have a done button in place of the logout button?
Great
Love it
Was one of the features that sold me on this alarm system.   Guess thats a breach of contract on their part.  Worked for like a week than quit working.  Wish they'd get there act together and fix it.
User friendly
Love it
Need to be able to control all facets on android, missing features that apple and pc have
Makes life easier when arming/disarming alarm, love it!
